name: browseVmwareSnapshot
description: For a virtual machine snapshot, list the directories and files that are beneath a specified file system path.

path.description: The absolute path of the starting point for the directory listing.

offset.description: Starting position in the list of path entries contained in the query results, sorted by lexicographical order. The response includes the specified numbered entry and all higher numbered entries.

limit.description: Maximum number of entries in the response.
